front.title: Simple Two-Way Active Measurement Protocol (STAMP) Extensions for Multi-path

abstract.t: STAMP is typically used to perform the measurement of one-way and round-trip performance metrics. However, when using active measurement mechanisms in a multi-path topology, the default forwarding behavior is to go through one path. So, it cannot collect the information of all the paths at one time. This document extends STAM with a Multi-path TLV to implement the multi-path performance measurement, which can help the operators to know the performance of network comprehensively and efficiently.
